caseTitle: Syed Khursheed Ahmed Shah v. The State through Chairman, National Accountability Bureau, NAB Headquarters, Islamabad and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline:
(1) The constitutional standard of “reasonable grounds” for depriving a person of his fundamental rights is to be read in all laws dealing or interfering with his liberty.  

(2) In the absence of sufficient incriminating material, depriving the accused of his liberty and freedom even for a single day is unconscionable and below human dignity.
